title: Just a body moving through space.
review: Those who are fan of the movie 'Rush' will obviously like this movie. It showed the golden age of the time. You will feel the pressure, suspens, and urge for the win in this movie. You can feel the speed frees up your soul.

title: Rapid and Spontaneous
review: The story line is rapid and spontaneous. You will not realise how fast this movie will end.

title: Twist after twist will create cold waves inside your lumbar spines.
review: You will experience twist after twist while watching this movie. It contains very mild but catchy dark humour. Some scenes will create cold waves inside your lumbar spine. You will be thinking the ways to get rid of the troubles along with the characters of the movie.
